channel.title: Miguel Angel Zotto on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Miguel Angel Zotto on Simba Tango

item.title: Reinvention
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: by pallotron "Those who don't understand [Tango] are condemned to reinvent it, poorly." – Henry Spencer (about Unix) I believe Miguel Angel Zotto to have said something along the same lines, that if you do not understand tango, how can you possibly improve it? I can’t seem to find the reference, though.

item.title: Classic Couples: Miguel Angel Zotto & Milena Plebs
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)

item.title: ¡Ahora, pollo!
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Returning again to Buenos Aires, a lot more experienced and familiar with music and culture than the first time I had read that another Alberto was still live and kicking, Alberto Podestá that would be. We had some tango musicians from our city coming down, and thought it would be an excellent thing to do with them. Podestá is singing at the place La Cumparsita in San Telmo, but for some reason or another we never made it while our musicians were in town.
